AI Description: r-affy is an R package for the pre-processing and analysis of high-throughput gene expression data generated from microarray technology. It provides functions for background correction, normalization, summarization, and quality assessment of microarray data.
Core Features:
1. Background correction for microarray data.
2. Normalization of gene expression values.
3. Summarization of probe intensity values.
4. Quality assessment tools for evaluating microarray data.
General Tags: Microarray, Gene Expression, Data Pre-Processing, Bioinformatics
